SQL.statement: CREATE TABLESPACE first PAGESIZE 4 K MANAGED BY AUTOMATIC STORAGE
create table case1(c1 int, c2 int with default 5) in first
create table case3(c1 int, c2 int generated always as identity) in first
create table case4(c1 int, c2 int generated by default as identity) in first
create table case2(c1 int, c2 int generated always as (c1 + 1)) in first
create table case5(c1 int, c2 int generated always as (c1 + 1), c3 int generated always as (c1 + 3)) in first
insert into case5 values(1, default, default)
create table case6(c1 int, c2 timestamp not null generated always FOR EACH ROW ON UPDATE AS ROW CHANGE TIMESTAMP) in first
CREATE TABLE A99999( ID_MIRROR CHAR(20) not null)
ALTER table A99999 add column employeeno integer CHECK (employeeno BETWEEN 100000 AND 999999)
ALTER table a99999 add RESTRICT ON DROP
